cards.question: What is the significance of the 42nd Amendment to the Indian Constitution?
cards.answer:
42nd Amendment (1976):
  • Introduced the words 'Socialist' and 'Secular' to the Preamble
  • Strengthened Directive Principles
  • Placed restrictions on judicial review

cards.question: Which amendment lowered the voting age from 21 to 18 years?
cards.answer: The 61st Amendment (1988) reduced the voting age for Lok Sabha and Assembly elections from 21 years to 18 years.
